pr_title: DBZ-2673 Read the raw bytes of a character-type field

timeline.message: DBZ-2673 Read the raw bytes of a character-type field
DBZ-2673 Read the raw bytes of a character-type field

timeline.bodyText: Is there a specific reason for using the type-name here rather than jdbc-type as in prior if conditions?
timeline.author: Naros

replies.bodyText: @Naros I actually had it like that at first, trouble was that MySQL's ENUM and SET were getting mapped to a JDBC char type which ended up causing the issues you saw earlier.
replies.author: okayrunner

timeline.message: DBZ-2673 Added comment; use defensive equals
